question: وَمُبَشِّرًا
answer: and a bearer of glad tidings

question: لِيُخْرِجَكُمْ
answer: so that He may bring you out

question: وَالْمُتَصَدِّقَاتِ
answer: and the women who give charity

question: وَالْمُتَصَدِّقِينَ
answer: and the men who give charity

question: فَيَطْمَعَ
answer: lest should be moved with desire

question: لَنُغْرِيَنَّكَ
answer: We will let you overpower them

question: تُمَتَّعُونَ
answer: you will be allowed to enjoy

question: وَأَوْرَثَكُمْ
answer: And He caused you to inherit
